name: Oppso Unit Converter
author: Dan Busuioc

sections.description:
Simple to use Unit Converter Plugin for WordPress. It displays both in Metric and Imperial units. For the time, you can use the following categories:

Length / Distance Converter
Temperature Converter
Time Converter
Weight Converter
Area Converter
Speed Converter

The plugin creates a shortcode so you can display these converters either in posts / pages or inside a sidebar within a text widget.

New features in version 1.1.1

  • Fixed working with jQuery 1.9+
sections.installation:
1. Upload oppso-unit-converter folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. A page is created under settings where you can see a list of shortcodes that you can use inside posts / pages or in a sidebar as a text widget.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • Fixed working with jQuery 1.9+

1.1

  • We added area & speed converter
  • You can now choose to display a single conversion category or all of them.
